Headline: #22 Clark Temporary Reroute at Clark/Addison
ShortDescription: 22 Clark buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Clark, Racine, Belmont, and Clark, due to street blockage near Clark/Addison.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#22 Clark buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Clark, Racine, Belmont, and Clark, due to street blockage near Clark/Addison.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: O'Hare-bound Blue Line Service Delayed at UIC-Halsted
ShortDescription: O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are standing at UIC-Halsted due to a mechanical problem on a train. ?Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are standing at UIC-Halsted due to a mechanical problem on a train.
Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
